name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Celery Root Purée
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on celery root purée. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient: 1 whole celery root, peeled and cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Boil celery root in water until soft, 15 to 20 minutes.
Mash, then whip, with the hot milk, some butter, and black pepper, until smooth. Serve.
